nodes.text: The Hall of Endurance was a location in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. After Jedi Master Dooku ordered his new Padawan Qui-Gon Jinn to meet him for training almost immediately, Padawan Gretz Droom taunted Jinn about his new Master's strictness. Droom's Master, Jor Aerith, overheard him and ordered him to meet her at the Hall of Enturance in an even shorter period of time. Droom began to question the deadline, but stopped and hurried away to avoid being late.
